title: Revealed: How rookie drivers can buy F1 free practice seats for $3.5m
summary: McLaren's court case against IndyCar champion Alex Palou has exposed the price that some drivers will pay to join a Formula 1 free practice session

qa_pairs.question: What is the reported price a rookie driver can pay to secure a free practice seat in Formula 1?
Which team is involved in a court case related to rookie drivers and free practice seats?
What type of racing champion is Alex Palou, who is mentioned in relation to the free practice seat controversy?
